attributes.action: make lorry and van drivers take a refreshers driving course every year to stop them mounting the curb/ pavements and scaring 3 year olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my mother was walking her 3 year old son and 1 year old daughter to school when a lorry driver mounted the pavement just missing her son. my mother and her son were terrified, surely children are important and need protecting from idiotic drivers that cant drive, imagine if something happend to one of your children image the devastation. a simple refreshers test can and will save lives if allowed to go on and sign below give the children a voice which can be heard.
